mapper.select: select e.permission from t_sys_user a join t_sys_user_role b on a.id = b.userId join t_sys_role c on b.roleId = c.id join t_sys_role_menu d on c.id=d.roleId join t_sys_menu e on d.menuId = e.id where a.id = #{userId} and e.status=0

select a.id, case when a.parentId='1' then '0' else a.parentId end as parentId, a.name, #{roleId} as roleId, case when b.roleId is not null then '1' else '0' end as flag from t_sys_menu a left join t_sys_role_menu b on a.id=b.menuId and b.roleId=#{roleId} where a.parentId = #{parentId} and a.status=0
